TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FileDialogCustomPlaces extends System.Object
public ref class FileDialogCustomPlaces abstract sealed

summary.span: Define las carpetas conocidas de las ubicaciones personalizadas en los cuadros de diálogo de archivo.

span.span: Defines the known folders for custom places in file dialog boxes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ubicaciones personalizadas están disponibles a partir de[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)].Custom places are available starting in[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Contacts As FileDialogCustomPlace
public: static property Microsoft::Win32::FileDialogCustomPlace ^ Contacts { Microsoft::Win32::FileDialogCustomPlace ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene la carpeta Contactos del usuario actual.

span.span: Gets the Contacts folder for the current user.
The Contacts folder for the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El GUID para esta carpeta es 56784854 C6CB 462b 8169 88E350ACB882.The GUID for this folder is 56784854-C6CB-462b-8169-88E350ACB882.
